client.data

Class RobPlayerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.data.PlayerInfo
      • client.data.RobPlayerInfo

  • public class RobPlayerInfo
extends PlayerInfo
    Used to pass player information into the rob view

    PROPERTIES:
    • Id: Unique player ID
    • PlayerIndex: Player's order in the game [0-3]
    • Name: Player's name (non-empty string)
    • Color: Player's color (cannot be null)
    • NumCards: Number of development cards the player has (ge 0)
